footer.cookie.title: üç™ Cookies!
footer.cookie.content: We use cookies to improve your experience of our website. By continuing to the next page or by pressing ‚ÄùOk‚Äù, you accept cookies. Read more about how we use cookies here.
footer.disclaimer: The Gimi Consumer Programme Prepaid Mastercard is issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011, FRN 900036, for the issuance of electronic money and provision of payment services. Registered Office: 5th Floor, Langham House, 302-308 Regent Street, London, W1B 3AT. Company Registration number: 06337638.
home.hero.title: Soon the new Gimi app is here
home.app.title: Allowance, interest and chores.
home.app.body: Get your allowance in your own savings account, grow your savings to finance your dreams and get paid for doing chores in the the home. The app is free and no bank account needed.
home.card.title: Spend like a master
home.card.body: No more coins and bills. Get your own card to pay for the things you want and follow your spendings in the app. With the Gimi card you can pay everywhere.
about.hero.title: We‚Äôre all about Financial Superskills
about.hero.subtitle: Money no longer exists in the form of cash. It has moved online - to ‚ÄãCyberspace, ‚Äãa parallel world of digital money. No more coins or notes - no more plastic piggy banks. In cyberspace, the laws of physics don‚Äôt apply. For everything here, including money, it‚Äôs the laws of the internet that matter. To rule Cyberspace, you need‚Äã Financial Superskills‚Äã. You can get these superskills by using the Gimi app, earning, growing and spending your own money. The more you use the app, the more your superskills grow.
about.contact.title: Say hello!
about.contact.subtitle: Got an idea about how we can improve things or wanna talk about Cyberspace, coins or chores? Ping us on the chat, send us an email or come by our office.
about.investor.title: Our investors
about.investor.body: This is how Gimi is financed. These people, investors and companies supports our journey towards teaching young people how to handle money in a cashless society.
about.board.title: Our board
about.micro.title: The Micro Managers
about.micro.body: For us at Gimi, you - the children are at the center.  In everything we do. The Micro Managers is our team of young experts who discuss, evaluate and tackle big ideas in order to help us make the app better everyday.
about.partners.title: Our partners
about.partners.subtitle: We are very proud of our world class partners who make Gimi possible.
about.team.title: Meet the team
about.team.subtitle: Here are some of the co-workers at Gimi.
about.vision.title: Vision
about.vision.content: We believe in young people and want to give them financial superskills - for life. At Gimi, we believe that Financial Superskills are essential in a cashless society and that young people should learn how to earn, save and spend their own money. This is why we‚Äôre building the best finance app on the planet for young people.
card.hero.title: Coming soon - the Gimi card
card.hero.subtitle: Experience financial freedom. Join the waitlist today and be the first one with a Gimi card.
card.contact.title: Sign up for the Card
card.contact.subtitle: Want to be first with a Gimi card? Get in the line!
card.test.title: The card test
card.test.subtitle: Our card test is developed together with some well renowned researchers, with the purpose to promote education about cards and responsible usage of cards. Do the card test and find out if you are ready for the Gimi Card.
card.why.title: Why you should get the card
card.why.subtitle1: Teach your child to pay. Physical and virtual card, works in store and online.
card.why.subtitle2: You stay in control. Follow your child‚Äôs spending, get notified.
card.why.subtitle3: Be safe. Block the card in the app. No overdrafts.
card.compare.title: Compare the Gimi card with a usual bank card for children
card.compare.block_in_app: Block and unblock card in app
help.hero.title: How can we help you?
help.hero.subtitle: Frequently asked questions
help.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
job.hero.title: Wanna join us?
job.hero.subtitle: We‚Äôre always on the hunt for stars who want to change how the way the world views money. If you feel curious, shoot us an email!
job.about.title: Our open positions
job.about.body: More about us on our job site
job.about.subtitle: No open positions at the moment.
news.hero.title: Hot for press
press.hero.title: Press
press.hero.subtitle: At Gimi we work with research, inquiries and analyses about the latest trends when it comes to children, youth and how money can be spend and handeled. We continuously publish press releases, material and statistics on this site.
press.asset.subtitle: Product & brand
press.contact.subtitle: For press enquiries please email philip@gimitheapp.com
press.press.subtitle: Our latest news ‚úåÔ∏è
press.research.subtitle: Our latest inquiries and results ‚úåÔ∏è
security.hero.title: Safety first
security.hero.subtitle: Gimi should be easily accessible for both parents and children, but even more importantly, we want you to feel safe when you use the app.
security.certification.title: Certifications
security.certification.subtitle: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)
security.details.title: How we work with security
security.details.body1: When you‚Äôre not managing real money in the Gimi app, security is probably not your greatest concern. But you should know we treat your personal data with huge respect, encrypting it all using SSL/HTTPS. We would never sell your data to third parties, and you can always ask us to permanently delete all your personal data. We are regulated by The Personal Data Act (PUL) and follow international GDPR regulations strictly.
security.details.body2: For our Premium users, who manage real money in the app, we provide an extra level of security. According to The Swedish Data Protection Authority, we use Strong Customer Authentication to secure your account. And for your own safety, we verify your identity before you can start managing money. In bank language, this is called Know Your Customer - all according to international banking regulations.
security.details.feature1.subtitle: We care about your data, and we work closely with our partners to make sure both we fulfill all international GDPR regulations.
security.details.feature2.subtitle: Users managing real money in the app can feel safe, your data is protected with a two factor authentication method.
security.details.feature3.subtitle: For users ordering the Card, we use Intantor to comply with all regulations around verifying users identity.
security.details.feature4.subtitle: In order to handle sensitive card data, such as card PINs and card details, we are compliant with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS).

download.subtitle: Enter your mobile number and we'll send a link to the App Store or Google Play via SMS

join.subtitle: Type in your information to get on the waiting list for the Gimi app.
waitlist.hero.title: The card will be here soon!
waitlist.hero.subtitle: The Gimi Card is now being printed and getting ready for launch.
waitlist.form.title: Sign up on the waiting list
waitlist.form.subtitle: No strings attached. Get on the waiting list and we'll e-mail you when yo can order the card.
waitlist_status.hero.title: Done! Your place on the waiting list:
waitlist_status.form.section1.title: Invite friends and move up on the waiting list!
waitlist_status.form.section1.subtitle: You move up 5 places on the waiting list for every friend you invite.
waitlist_status.form.section2.title: You passed the card test üëç

about.partners.mastercard.title: Mastercard
about.partners.mastercard.body:
MasterCard Incorporated is a technology company that connects consumers, financial institutions, merchants, governments and businesses across the world, enabling them to use electronic forms of payment. 
www.mastercard.com
about.partners.pfs.title: PFS
about.partners.pfs.body:
Our London based card issuer and acquirer, world leader in prepaid cards and e-money solutions. 
www.prepaidfinancialservices.com
about.partners.instantor.title: Instantor
about.partners.instantor.body:
Instantor provides us with a safe and instant solution for identifying customers, all according to EU banking regulations. 
www.instantor.com

404.not.found.subtitle: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for.
reduced.home.hero.title: Soon the new Gimi will be here!
reduced.home.hero.tagline: Download our app! It's soon going to be updated with new cool features üèÑ
